text: "Young Years" is a 1989 song by New Zealand group Dragon. It was taken from their ninth studio album Bondi Road. It went to number 18 in Australia and number 13 in New Zealand and became popular after Marc Hunter's death in 1998. == Track listing == # Young Years (Alan Mansfield, Sharon O'Neill) – 3:56 # Runaway (Alan Mansfield, Sharon O'Neill) – 3:49 == References == Category:1989 songs Category:Rock songs Category:Dragon (band) songs
title: Young Years
